Package Documentation

Class Cuboid

java.lang.Object
Documentation.Rectangle
Documentation.Cuboid
class Cuboid extends Rectangle
A Cuboid class representing a 3-D Figure having length, Breadth and Height.
Since:
2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ansh-Vikalp
